Package diclemed

Class Account

java.lang.Object
diclemed.Account
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckingAccount, SavingsAccount
public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
This is an abstract class that defines the behaviors of the various types of accounts available to the user.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected double balance  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    protected Account()
    Default constructor sets default values for account number and customer name.
      Account​(double balance)
    Constructs an Account object with a given balance.
      Account​(java.lang.String accountNo, java.lang.String customerName, double balance)
    Constructs an Account object with a given account number, customer name, and balance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deposit​(double amount)
    Receives deposit amount and adds it to current account balance.
    java.lang.String getAccountNo()
    Retrieves the account number.
    double getBalance()
    Retrieves account balance.
    java.lang.String getCustomerName()
    Retrieves the customer name.
    void setAccountNo​(java.lang.String accountNo)
    Sets the customers account number.
    abstract void setAnnualEarnings()
    Forces sub-classes to implement a method to calculate earnings.
    void setBalance​(double amount)
    Sets a new balance for the account.
    void setCustomerName​(java.lang.String customerName)
    Sets the name of the customer.
    abstract double setInterestRate()
    Forces sub-classes to implement a method that sets the interest rate of the account.
    void withdraw​(double amount)
    Receives withdrawal amount and subtracts it from current account balance.

  • Field Details

    • balance

      protected double balance

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      protected Account()
      Default constructor sets default values for account number and customer name. Sets account balance to zero.

    • Account

      public Account​(double balance)
      Constructs an Account object with a given balance.
      Parameters:
      balance - the opening balance for account

    • Account

      public Account​(java.lang.String accountNo, java.lang.String customerName, double balance)
      Constructs an Account object with a given account number, customer name, and balance.
      Parameters:
      accountNo - the customers account number
      customerName - the customers name
      balance - the opening balance of the account

  • Method Details

    • getAccountNo

      public java.lang.String getAccountNo()
      Retrieves the account number.
      Returns:
      the number of the customers account

    • getCustomerName

      public java.lang.String getCustomerName()
      Retrieves the customer name.
      Returns:
      the customer name

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Retrieves account balance.
      Returns:
      the account balance

    • setAccountNo

      public void setAccountNo​(java.lang.String accountNo)
      Sets the customers account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNo - the number of the customers account

    • setCustomerName

      public void setCustomerName​(java.lang.String customerName)
      Sets the name of the customer.
      Parameters:
      customerName - the name of the customer

    • setBalance

      public void setBalance​(double amount)
      Sets a new balance for the account. Receives new balance from the withdraw() method.
      Parameters:
      amount - the new account balance after a withdrawal
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the new balance will be negative

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw​(double amount)
      Receives withdrawal amount and subtracts it from current account balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - the withdrawal amount
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if withdrawal amount is a negative number

    • deposit

      public void deposit​(double amount)
      Receives deposit amount and adds it to current account balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to be deposited
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if deposit amount is a negative number

    • setAnnualEarnings

      public abstract void setAnnualEarnings()
      Forces sub-classes to implement a method to calculate earnings.

    • setInterestRate

      public abstract double setInterestRate()
      Forces sub-classes to implement a method that sets the interest rate of the account.
      Returns:
      the interest rate for the specific account
